Metric Category: - Velocity declining 2 weeks in a row
- Velocity flat 2 weeks in a row
- All metrics at or above target
Revenue per Distribution Point = Weekly Revenue / Active Distribution Points
Cases per Point (Velocity) = Cases Shipped / Active Distribution Points
Cash Runway = Cash Balance / Average Weekly Burn Rate
Operating Expense Ratio = Operating Expenses / Revenue
Production Efficiency = Actual Output / Planned Output
Fundraising: Manual tracking in shared spreadsheet
